interpretation:
Opener has 13-21 points and 4+ diamonds.
Denies 5 card major. Denies balanced hand
Responder has 0-5 points
May have support for opener's suit

hints.hint0: To show new major requires 4 cards, 5 for minor
hints.hint1:
Small=13-15, Medium=16-18, Large=19-21
Look for new suit or 6+ in opening suit
hints.hint2:
13-15	W: 1W
	6+D: 2O
	Competition: Pass
	Default: 1NT
16-18	6+D: 3O
	W: 1W
	Default: 1NT
19-21	W: JS
	6+D: 3NT
	Balanced, 20+ HCP: 3NT
	Balanced, 18-19 HCP: 2NT
	7+D: GameO
	6+D: 3O
	Default: 2NT
